overview: Ritwik, a man in his mid-thirties, is caught in a quagmire between his past and his present. As a result of which he often zones out from everyday life. This has deeply strained his relationship with his wife, Vidya, who believes that this is disdain directed towards her. Within this chaos, Ritwik finds solace in the snippets he captures of his daily life on his handycam.
title: Shadow
